languages.text: {n}Слуга переходит на шепот:{/n} "Слыхали про случай с мутантами? Так вот, нашли на кого свалить вину. Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} судить поленились, заставили ползать в грязи {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}да молить о пощаде{/d}... Вот так. Да, Мейв?"
languages.translation_comment:
если заставили просить о пощаде в MoraliteAftermath
Пузатый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: {n}Слуга переходит на шепот:{/n} "Слыхали про случай с мутантами? Так вот, нашли на кого свалить вину. Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} судить поленились, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}заставили ползать в грязи да молить о пощаде{/d}... Вот так. Да, Мейв?"
traits.speaker: FW_GossipingCommoner2

languages.translation_comment:
если заставили просить о пощаде в MoraliteAftermath
Пузатый простолюдин

languages.text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they sure found someone to blame. The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't even bother with a trial. {rt_mf|He|She} made 'em crawl in the mud, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}begging for mercy{/d}... That's right! Isn't it, Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}Слуга переходит на шепот:{/n} "Слыхали про случай с мутантами? Так вот, нашли на кого свалить вину. Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} судить поленились, заставили ползать в грязи {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}да молить о пощаде{/d}... Вот так. Да, Мейв?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant incident? Well, they found someone they could pin it on. The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't even bother with a trial. {rt_mf|He|She} made him crawl in the mud, begging for mercy... And that was that. Wasn't it, Maive?"

languages.text: {n}眼前的仆人压低了声音，仿佛耳语一般。{/n}“你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？他们找到了替罪羊，而那位来自上界的大人甚至连做做审判的样子都懒得做。{rt_mf|他|她}让那两个人跪在泥巴里，{d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}祈求怜悯{/d}……当时的情况就是这样！是吧，梅芙？”
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they sure found someone to blame. The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't even bother with a trial. {rt_mf|He|She} made 'em crawl in the mud, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}begging for mercy{/d}... That's right! Isn't it, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的仆人压低了声音，仿佛耳语一般。{/n}“你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？他们找到了替罪羊，而那位来自上界的大人甚至连做做审判的样子都懒得做。{rt_mf|他|她}让那两个人跪在泥巴里，祈求怜悯……当时的情况就是这样！是吧，梅芙？”
{n}眼前的仆人压低了声音，仿佛耳语一般。{/n}“你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？他们找到了替罪羊，而那位来自上界的大人甚至连做做审判的样子都懒得做。{rt_mf|他|她}让那两个人跪在泥巴里，祈求怜悯……当时的情况就是这样！是吧，梅芙？”

languages.text: {n}El sirviente baja la voz y susurra.{/n} «¿Os habéis enterado del desastre del mutante? No han tardado en encontrar culpables. {rt_mf|El Señor Celestial|La Señora Celestial} ni se ha molestado en celebrar un juicio. Ha hecho que se arrastraran por el barro, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}suplicando clemencia{/d}. ¡Sin más! ¿Verdad, Maive?».
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they sure found someone to blame. The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't even bother with a trial. {rt_mf|He|She} made 'em crawl in the mud, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}begging for mercy{/d}... That's right! Isn't it, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El sirviente baja la voz y susurra.{/n} «¿Os habéis enterado del desastre del mutante? No han tardado en encontrar culpables. {rt_mf|El Señor Celestial|La Señora Celestial} ni se ha molestado en celebrar un juicio. Ha hecho que se arrastraran por el barro, suplicando clemencia. ¡Sin más! ¿Verdad, Maive?».

{n}El sirviente baja la voz y susurra.{/n} «¿Os habéis enterado del desastre del mutante? No han tardado en encontrar culpables. {rt_mf|El Señor Celestial|La Señora Celestial} ni se ha molestado en celebrar un juicio. Ha hecho que se arrastraran por el barro, suplicando clemencia. ¡Sin más! ¿Verdad, Maive?».

languages.text: {n}Hizmetkâr, sesini alçaltıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Mutant felaketini duydun mu? Suçlayacak birini buldular. Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, duruşmayla uğraşmadı bile. Onları çamurda süründürdü, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}merhamet dilendirdi{/d}... Aynen öyle! Değil mi Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they sure found someone to blame. The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't even bother with a trial. {rt_mf|He|She} made 'em crawl in the mud, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}begging for mercy{/d}... That's right! Isn't it, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetkâr, sesini alçaltıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Mutant felaketini duydun mu? Suçlayacak birini buldular. Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, mahkemeyle uğraşmadı bile. Onları çamurda süründürdü, merhamet dilendirdi... Aynen öyle! Değil mi Maive?"

{n}Hizmetkâr, sesini alçaltıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Mutant felaketini duydun mu? Suçlayacak birini buldular. Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, duruşmayla uğraşmadı bile. Onları çamurda süründürdü, merhamet dilendirdi... Aynen öyle! Değil mi Maive?"

languages.text: {n}使用人は声を低めて囁く。{/n}「変異体の身に降りかかったことを聞いた？彼らは確かに責めを受ける者を見つけたんだ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は裁判を邪魔することもなく、彼らに慈悲を乞うように地面にひれ{d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}伏させたってことだ{/d}。そうなんだよね、メイヴ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they sure found someone to blame. The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't even bother with a trial. {rt_mf|He|She} made 'em crawl in the mud, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}begging for mercy{/d}... That's right! Isn't it, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}使用人は声を低めて囁く。{/n}「変異体の身に降りかかったことを聞いた？彼らは確かに責めを受ける者を見つけたんだ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は裁判を邪魔することもなく、彼らに慈悲を乞うように地面にひれ伏させたってことだ。そうなんだよね、メイヴ？」
{n}使用人は声を低めて囁く。{/n}「変異体の身に降りかかったことを聞いた？彼らは確かに責めを受ける者を見つけたんだ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は裁判を邪魔することもなく、彼らに慈悲を乞うように地面にひれ伏させたってことだ。そうなんだよね、メイヴ？」

languages.text: {n}Le serviteur baisse le ton jusqu'à ce que sa voix ne soit plus qu'un faible murmure :{/n} « Vous avez entendu parler du désastre avec le mutant ? Eh bien, ils n'ont pas traîné pour désigner un coupable. {rt_mf|Le Seigneur|La Seigneure} Céleste ne s'est même pas {rt_mf|encombré|encombrée} d'un procès.{rt_mf|Il|Elle} l'a obligé à ramper dans la boue et à {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}implorer sa miséricorde{/d}... Eh ouais ! N'est-ce pas, Maive ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they sure found someone to blame. The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't even bother with a trial. {rt_mf|He|She} made 'em crawl in the mud, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}begging for mercy{/d}... That's right! Isn't it, Maive?"

Eh bien, ils n'ont pas traîné pour désigner un coupable. {rt_mf|Le Seigneur|La Seigneure} Céleste ne s'est même pas {rt_mf|encombré|encombrée} d'un procès.{rt_mf|Il|Elle} l'a obligé à ramper dans la boue et à implorer sa miséricorde... Eh ouais ! N'est-ce pas, Maive ? »

{n}Le serviteur baisse le ton jusqu'à ce que sa voix ne soit plus qu'un faible murmure :{/n} « Vous avez entendu parler du désastre avec le mutant ? Eh bien, ils n'ont pas traîné pour désigner un coupable. {rt_mf|Le Seigneur|La Seigneure} Céleste ne s'est même pas {rt_mf|encombré|encombrée} d'un procès.{rt_mf|Il|Elle} l'a obligé à ramper dans la boue et à implorer sa miséricorde... Eh ouais ! N'est-ce pas, Maive ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Diener senkt die Stimme zu einem Flüstern.{/n}"Habt Ihr von der Katastrophe mit den Mutanten gehört? Tja, sie haben jemanden gefunden, dem sie die Schuld geben können. {rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat sich nicht mal die Mühe gemacht, einen Prozess abzuhalten. Hat sie einfach im Schlamm robben und {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}um Gnade winseln lassen{/d} ... So war das! Nicht wahr, Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they sure found someone to blame. The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't even bother with a trial. {rt_mf|He|She} made 'em crawl in the mud, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteBeggarsDecision}begging for mercy{/d}... That's right! Isn't it, Maive?"

Tja, sie haben jemanden gefunden, dem sie die Schuld geben können. {rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat sich nicht mal die Mühe gemacht, einen Prozess abzuhalten. Hat sie einfach im Schlamm robben und um Gnade winseln lassen ... So war das! Nicht wahr, Maive?"

Tja, sie haben jemanden gefunden, dem sie die Schuld geben können. {rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat sich nicht mal die Mühe gemacht, einen Prozess abzuhalten. Hat sie einfach im Schlamm robben und um Gnade winseln lassen ... So war das! Nicht wahr, Maive?"
